disease: Malignant neoplasm of connective and soft tissue of trunk, unspecified

symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.pattern: May be absent initially, can become severe as tumor grows

symptoms.name: Weakness
symptoms.pattern: May be localized or generalized depending on tumor location and size

vital_signs.heart_rate: May be elevated in advanced stages
vital_signs.respiratory_rate: May be elevated in advanced stages
vital_signs.blood_pressure: May be elevated or decreased depending on tumor location and size

imaging_findings.CT scan: May show mass, extent of involvement
imaging_findings.MRI: May show mass, extent of involvement, tissue characteristics
imaging_findings.PET scan: May show metabolic activity of tumor

required: Imaging evidence of a mass in the trunk
supportive: Clinical symptoms and physical findings consistent with the diagnosis
